title: Projects
text:
Projects
Below are selected projects showcasing my experience in machine learning, deep learning, NLP, data storytelling, and AI product design.


SoundFlow: Intelligent Music Understanding and Generation
Tech: PyTorch, Librosa, CNNs, NSynth
Skills: Deep learning, audio preprocessing, log-mel spectrograms
Role: Built and trained CNN model to classify audio sources (acoustic, electronic, synthetic); extracted meaningful spectrogram features to support downstream generative audio modeling
View project



From Land Seizure to Repatriation: Storytelling Dashboard
Tech: R, Quarto, Leaflet, VegaLite
Skills: Data storytelling, geospatial visualization, time-series UI design
Role: Designed interactive dashboard tracing Indigenous dispossession and repatriation efforts; integrated multi-source data with narrative-driven visual flow
View project



NLP-Powered Perfume Recommendation System
Tech: Python, scikit-learn, Transformers, NLTK, Streamlit
Skills: NLP, sentiment analysis, GPT-2, decision trees, recommendation systems
Role: Built end-to-end perfume recommendation system with sentiment analysis, decision tree-based filtering, and GPT-2 text generation for custom descriptions
View project



Modular AI Agent System for E-commerce Automation
Tech: Python, UML, draw.io, Prompt Design
Skills: AI system architecture, task decomposition, reusable agent capability planning
Role: Designed modular AI Agent framework for automating actions like bidding, budgeting, and sentiment monitoring across Amazon ads; mapped business workflows to reusable capabilities (image generation, sentiment analysis, sales prediction)
View project

Hello! I am Kexin Lyu, Cindy


Welcome to my personal website as a Data Science student!

Featured Projects
Here are a few highlights of my recent work in data science and AI product development:
